顇字的基本解释

顇
cuì
同“悴”。

顇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuì］
［《廣韻》秦醉切，去至，從。］
(1)憔悴；瘦弱。
(2)劳累。
(3)困苦。
(4)忧愁。
(5)疾病。
(6)通“粹”。
(7)通“萃”。众多貌。

顇字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顇； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1406第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?秦醉切，音萃。【說文】顦顇也。【爾雅·釋詁】顇，病也。【揚雄·反離騷】慶夭顇而喪榮。　又通作瘁。【詩·小雅】維躬是瘁。【註】顇瘁音義同。又【集韻】昨律切，音卒。?顇，面短貌。

顇

顇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cuì］
["Guangyun" Qin Zuiqie, go to, from. ]
(1) Haggard; thin and weak.
(2) Tired.
(3) Hardship.
(4) Sadness.
(5) Disease.
(6) Through "pure".
(7) Through "extraction". Many appearances.

【戌集下】【Page Department】　顇; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1406 Page 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Qin Zuiqie, sound collection. [Said the text] 顦顇 also. 【Erya·Shi Xun】Supplied, sick too. [Yang Xiong·Fan Lisao] Celebrate Yao's mourning and lose honor.　It's getting sick again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Wei Gong is lame. [Note] The sound and meaning are the same. Also 【Jiyun】Yesterday, the rhythm is cut, and the sound is played.顇, short-faced.
